videoframeSigmonVm0001MIB.name: videoframeSigmonVm0001MIB
videoframeSigmonVm0001MIB.contactinfo: Videoframe Systems P.O. Box 1991, Grass Valley, CA 95945, USA. +1 (530) 477-2000 http://www.videoframesystems.com
videoframeSigmonVm0001MIB.description: This MIB describes the device specific objects of the VM0001 Analog Audio Monitoring module, and augments MIB-2, VF-GENERIC, and VF-SIGMON in the identification of this Videoframe Systems managed device. This module will be extended or modified as required. Videoframe Systems reserves the right to make changes in specification and other information contained in this document without prior notice. The reader should consult Videoframe Systems to determine whether any such changes have been made. In no event shall Videoframe Systems be liable for any incidental, indirect, special, or consequential damages whatsoever (including but not limited to lost profits) arising out of or related to this document or the information contained in it. Videoframe Systems grants vendors, end users, and other interested parties a non-exclusive license to use this specification in connection with the management of Videoframe Systems products. Copyright 2001 Videoframe, Inc.

vfProductsVM0001Reg.name: vfProductsVM0001Reg
vfProductsVM0001Reg.description: Videoframe VM0001 Analog Audio Monitoring Module.

vm0001Table.name: vm0001Table
vm0001Table.description: Each row contains information about one VM0001 Analog Audio module in the managed VF200 frame.

vm0001SlotNumber.name: vm0001SlotNumber
vm0001SlotNumber.description: The slot that this entry represents.

vm0001Active.name: vm0001Active
vm0001Active.description: Indicates whether this entry is active (this module is in this slot).

vm0001FirmwareRev.name: vm0001FirmwareRev
vm0001FirmwareRev.description: The revision level of the firmware on this module.

vm0001Locate.name: vm0001Locate
vm0001Locate.description: Controls the locate indicator on the module and indicates its current state. Set to flash (1) to cause the locate LED on the front of the module to begin flashing. Set to off to stop flashing.

vm0001SignalTable.name: vm0001SignalTable
vm0001SignalTable.description: Each row contains information about one channel of one VM0001 Analog Audio module in the managed VF200 frame.

vm0001SignalEntry.name: vm0001SignalEntry
vm0001SignalEntry.description: An Analog Audio module channel entry.

vm0001SignalSlotNumber.name: vm0001SignalSlotNumber
vm0001SignalSlotNumber.description: The frame slot number that this entry represents.

vm0001SignalNumber.name: vm0001SignalNumber
vm0001SignalNumber.description: The channel within the module to which this signal is connected.

vm0001SignalName.name: vm0001SignalName
vm0001SignalName.description: The name of the signal connected to this channel.

vm0001SignalDescription.name: vm0001SignalDescription
vm0001SignalDescription.description: Descriptive identification of the signal connected to this channel.

vm0001CurrentAplRaw.name: vm0001CurrentAplRaw
vm0001CurrentAplRaw.description: The current average amplitude value on this channel, in raw sample units.

vm0001ZerodBCalibrationSet.name: vm0001ZerodBCalibrationSet
vm0001ZerodBCalibrationSet.description: Set to 'go' (2) to set the value of the 0 dB channel calibration to the current average amplitude value on this channel.

vm0001ZerodBCalibrationValue.name: vm0001ZerodBCalibrationValue
vm0001ZerodBCalibrationValue.description: The current raw sample amplitude value used as the 0 dB reference on this channel.

vm0001AplHighThreshold.name: vm0001AplHighThreshold
vm0001AplHighThreshold.description: The high APL alarm threshold for this channel, in dB.

vm0001AplHighDuration.name: vm0001AplHighDuration
vm0001AplHighDuration.description: The high APL duration, in milliseconds, at which to alarm, for this channel.

vm0001AplHighAlarmState.name: vm0001AplHighAlarmState
vm0001AplHighAlarmState.description: The current state of the high APL alarm for this channel.

vm0001AplHighAlarmAck.name: vm0001AplHighAlarmAck
vm0001AplHighAlarmAck.description: Set to acknowledge (3) to acknowledge a triggered high APL alarm for this channel.

vm0001AplHighTrapEnable.name: vm0001AplHighTrapEnable
vm0001AplHighTrapEnable.description: Set to enabled (1) to enable the high APL alarm trap for this channel.

vm0001AplLowThreshold.name: vm0001AplLowThreshold
vm0001AplLowThreshold.description: The low APL alarm threshold for this channel, in dB.

vm0001AplLowDuration.name: vm0001AplLowDuration
vm0001AplLowDuration.description: The low APL duration, in milliseconds, at which to alarm, for this channel.

vm0001AplLowAlarmState.name: vm0001AplLowAlarmState
vm0001AplLowAlarmState.description: The current state of the low APL alarm for this channel.

vm0001AplLowAlarmAck.name: vm0001AplLowAlarmAck
vm0001AplLowAlarmAck.description: Set to acknowledge (3) to acknowledge a triggered low APL alarm for this channel.

vm0001AplLowTrapEnable.name: vm0001AplLowTrapEnable
vm0001AplLowTrapEnable.description: Set to enabled (1) to enable the low APL alarm trap for this channel.

vm0001PeakThreshold.name: vm0001PeakThreshold
vm0001PeakThreshold.description: The peak level above which to alarm.

vm0001PeakPeriod.name: vm0001PeakPeriod
vm0001PeakPeriod.description: The period, in milliseconds, over which the peak value is accumulated for this channel.

vm0001PeakAlarmState.name: vm0001PeakAlarmState
vm0001PeakAlarmState.description: The current state of the peak-threshold-exceeded alarm for this channel.

vm0001PeakAlarmAck.name: vm0001PeakAlarmAck
vm0001PeakAlarmAck.description: Set to acknowledge (3) to acknowledge a triggered peak alarm for this channel.

vm0001PeakTrapEnable.name: vm0001PeakTrapEnable
vm0001PeakTrapEnable.description: Set to enabled (1) to enable the peak alarm trap for this channel.

vm0001StereoPairTable.name: vm0001StereoPairTable
vm0001StereoPairTable.description: Each row contains information about one stereo pair on one VM0001 Analog Audio module in the managed VF200 frame.

vm0001StereoPairEntry.name: vm0001StereoPairEntry
vm0001StereoPairEntry.description: An Analog Audio module channel entry.

vm0001StereoPairSlotNumber.name: vm0001StereoPairSlotNumber
vm0001StereoPairSlotNumber.description: The slot that this entry represents.

vm0001StereoPairNumber.name: vm0001StereoPairNumber
vm0001StereoPairNumber.description: The channel within the module to which this signal is connected.

vm0001StereoPairName.name: vm0001StereoPairName
vm0001StereoPairName.description: The name of the signal connected to this channel.

vm0001StereoPairDescription.name: vm0001StereoPairDescription
vm0001StereoPairDescription.description: Descriptive identifier of the signal connected to this channel.

vm0001MonoFilter.name: vm0001MonoFilter
vm0001MonoFilter.description: The filter type currently selected for the mono alarm for this stereo pair.

vm0001MonoDuration.name: vm0001MonoDuration
vm0001MonoDuration.description: The mono duration, in milliseconds, at which to alarm, for this stereo pair.

vm0001MonoAlarmState.name: vm0001MonoAlarmState
vm0001MonoAlarmState.description: The current state of the mono alarm for this stereo pair.

vm0001MonoAlarmAck.name: vm0001MonoAlarmAck
vm0001MonoAlarmAck.description: Set to acknowledge (3) to acknowledge a triggered mono alarm for this stereo pair.

vm0001MonoTrapEnable.name: vm0001MonoTrapEnable
vm0001MonoTrapEnable.description: Set to enabled (1) to enable the high APL alarm trap for this stereo pair.

vm0001StereoOutOfPhaseFilter.name: vm0001StereoOutOfPhaseFilter
vm0001StereoOutOfPhaseFilter.description: The filter type currently selected for the stereo out of phase alarm for this stereo pair.

vm0001StereoOutOfPhaseDuration.name: vm0001StereoOutOfPhaseDuration
vm0001StereoOutOfPhaseDuration.description: The stereo out of phase duration, in milliseconds, at which to alarm, for this stereo pair.

vm0001StereoOutOfPhaseAlarmState.name: vm0001StereoOutOfPhaseAlarmState
vm0001StereoOutOfPhaseAlarmState.description: The current state of the stereo out of phase alarm for this stereo pair.

vm0001StereoOutOfPhaseAlarmAck.name: vm0001StereoOutOfPhaseAlarmAck
vm0001StereoOutOfPhaseAlarmAck.description: Set to acknowledge (3) to acknowledge a triggered stereo out of phase alarm for this stereo pair.

analogAudioAPLHighAlarm.name: analogAudioAPLHighAlarm
analogAudioAPLHighAlarm.description: An Analog Audio APL high alarm was triggered.

analogAudioAPLLowAlarm.name: analogAudioAPLLowAlarm
analogAudioAPLLowAlarm.description: An Analog Audio APL low alarm was triggered.

analogAudioPeakAlarm.name: analogAudioPeakAlarm
analogAudioPeakAlarm.description: An Analog Audio peak threshold exceeded alarm was triggered.

analogAudioMonoAlarm.name: analogAudioMonoAlarm
analogAudioMonoAlarm.description: An Analog Audio mono alarm was triggered.

analogAudioStereoOutOfPhaseAlarm.name: analogAudioStereoOutOfPhaseAlarm
analogAudioStereoOutOfPhaseAlarm.description: An Analog Audio stereo out of phase alarm was triggered.
